Title: Bride Unbridled
Plot: Cate and Ryan are forced to put on a happy face as the hosts of a wedding expo, but the unfortunate situation becomes even more unfortunate after Baze and Math show up at the event. After watching Lux mope around the house for days, Baze solicits help from Jones in an effort to cheer her up.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
